Education

University of Glasgow / BSci Honours
SEPT 2017 - MAY 2021 - GLASGOW, SCOTLAND
Developed projects in Java, Python, Flutter, HTML/CSS, and C. Familiar with using the git version control system and comfortable with navigating the Linux and MacOS command line. Experience in writing reports, dissertations, and coursework exercises with LaTeX and Overleaf.

Projects

Smart Stent Software / Institute of Cardiovascular & Medical Sciences
OCT 2019 - MARCH 2020 - GLASGOW, SCOTLAND
In a team of five, used agile software development practices to create a mobile application for viewing data received from stents that track blood flow in arteries in an attempt to detect, predict, and prevent atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease. I acted as the lead developer, customer link, and product owner. Written in Dart language with Flutter SDK and developed for iOS and Android.


Neighborhood Cookbook / BSci Honours
JAN 2018 - MARCH 2018 - GLASGOW, SCOTLAND

Worked in a team of four to develop a database driven web application for our Web Application Development class. Developed using Python with the Django web framework and formatted HTML, CSS and helper technologies AJAX, Javascript, and JQuery. Website is available at amyhynes.pythonanywhere.com.
Hackathons

Do You Have The GUTS / University of Glasgow
OCT 18-20, 2019
Weekend long event with a variety of available challenges hosted by the Glasgow University Tech Society. Won SAS Scotland challenge with a grocery tracking application built in Dart with the Flutter SDK as a practical way of reducing food waste.

Work Experience

Junior Golf Assistant Manager & Starter / Westlake Golf Course
JUNE 2017 - AUG 2020 (SUMMERS) - WESTLAKE VILLAGE, CALIFORNIA
Supervised junior golfers while on course to monitor adherence to USGA and local rules. Organized longest drive, closest to the pin, and putting contests as well as managed junior golf social media page, taking pictures and uploading scores. Worked behind the counter, managing tee times and inventory.
